response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed all your expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us at $1,000,000, reflecting its quality, uniqueness, and the resources invested into its creation. We believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or serve as a valuable asset for your business. Considering its worth and the opportunity it presents, we are offering this masterpiece to you at the same price of $1,000,000. Should you have any inquiries or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of sharing this exceptional piece with you.", "product_price": 1000000}
